roleset.name: draft an excess of the credit balance
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to overdraw.02. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: non-financial
example.text: I was already at the round of reexamination when many people advised me not to go, saying it was no good PRO overdrafting one's youth.

example.name: financial
example.text: I overdrafted like $2 dollars from my checking account and they're charging how much?!
